mapper.select: select orderno, email, username, folder, thumbnail, original, filename, price, createdt, charged, expiredt from "order" where orderno = #{orderno} and email = #{email} and charged = true and expiredt >= #{expiredt} order by createdt asc

select "order".username, "order".folder, "order".thumbnail, "order".price, count(1) as qty, sum("order".price) as amount from "order" inner join photo on "order".username = photo.username and "order".folder = photo.folder and "order".thumbnail = photo.thumbnail where "order".username = #{username} and "order".folder = #{folder} and "order".charged = true group by "order".username, "order".folder, "order".thumbnail, "order".price order by qty desc, amount desc
mapper.insert: insert into "order" (orderno, email, username, folder, thumbnail, original, filename, price, createdt, charged, expiredt) values (#{orderno}, #{email}, #{username}, #{folder}, #{thumbnail}, #{original}, #{filename}, #{price}, #{createdt}, #{charged}, #{expiredt})
mapper.update: update "order" set charged = true, expiredt = #{expiredt} where orderno = #{orderno} and email = #{email} and charged = false
mapper.delete: delete from "order" where orderno = #{orderno} and charged = false
